item.title: ARP
item.description: Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) is used to get Mac Address of a host from using its IPV4 Address. How ARP Works When a host needs to find Mac Address of destination device in same network, following steps are followed by the host.

item.title: Bandwidth vs Throughput
item.description: Bandwidth It is the total capacity of a network to transfer data over an interval of time. It is measured in kbps, mbps, gbps. Throughput It is also the capacity of network to transfer data but also considers latency and other factors.

item.title: Ethernet Protocol
item.description: Ethernet Frame Ethernet frame are a part of Data Link Layer of OSI Model. Data to be transported between one NIC to other NIC in the same network is transported through the Ethernet Protocol.
